briefDescription: Taking care of the under privileged children by providing them food, shelter and clothing. Providing them entertainment to bring back their education. Assisting in their hour of distress, providing them medical assistance. Orphan children are dreams they are the future citizens to the glorious world. To lead a dignified and glorious life in the society. The culture, fundamental rights and responsibility are educated to the children by professionals. This paradise was our dream.         The deprived Children need Education attention. Physically challenged children a misfortune to the society most people neglect or reject. Educate them for their well being, professional training to their interests. Guiding them to attain academic skills.
